name: Mari and the Black Tower
description: Mari and the Black Tower is a throwback to classic JRPGs and rogue-like dungeon-crawlers. Join Mari, Abbie and a team of heroes to scale the Black Tower in this classic experience with a modern twist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 2.0GHz quad-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 2.0GHz quad-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
